summary: Feature request to warn developers when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task. This would help identify timing discrepancies in task execution.
userImpact: Developers would receive warnings about timing mismatches between server and SDK task processing, helping identify potential timing issues.
resolutionDetails: Closed as the feature request was deemed too niche for implementation.
keyQuote: We're not gonna do this. Too niche.
